devdoc.details: A factory contract that creates Card contracts.

getCardHash(uint256).details: Calculates the hash value for a given card. This function should only be used to test hash values.

isWhitelisted(address).details: Checks if an address is in the whitelist.

returns._0: A boolean indicating whether the address is in the whitelist.

params.addresses: The addresses to update the whitelist.

devdoc.title: CardManager

getCardAddress(bytes32).notice: calculate the counterfactual address of this card as it would be returned by createCard()
